name: Lore.
text: Working with Danilo means having someone reliable, precise, and with a real design vision. He doesn't just write code that works â€” he wants it to look great too.

name: Guillaume H.
text: I've had the pleasure of being Danilo's PHP teacher and of supervising his final project at Maisonneuve. He's a fast learner, a very detail-oriented person and a highly motivated worker. Hire him!
